◆ create()

template<class t >
void eternity::create ( std::string  cls_name,
t **  ppObj 
)

This function return a pointer to an object that belong to the class specified by the string cls_name. If success put in *ppObj that pointer, otherwise put a NULL value in *ppObj.

Definition at line 155 of file dynamic.hpp.

◆ get_conventional_name()

std::string eternity::get_conventional_name ( std::string  compiler_name)

Search over all register facotry to found the conventional name of a class that the compiler identified with compiler_name. Otherwise return an empty string.
